title: How to get good fantasy ideas for writing - Quora

response.answer_text: Read outside. Don’t think anything is impossible or even improbable, just let your mind open to anything. When you’re outside think of all the mythological creatures that would enjoy that place, weather, etc. Create your own world, find a person within that world, and tell their story. or just take a nap?
Make the ordinary extraordinary and the extraordinary ordinary…. Take something you know from life and make it bigger… And… Make the characters have recognizeabe wants and needs.
